string-array.name: notify_texts
string-array.item: It is time to get to work now.The best of Butt and Legs is waiting for you.
Hey! Do not second-guess to start the Butt and Legs workout right now.
Butt and Legs remind you not to miss today’s workout. Let’s go!
Hello!!! Remember to sweat today with Butt and Legs and don’t miss it.
Butt and Legs workout CANNOT be missed. Get to it right now.
If you are determined to get what you want remember to workout today.
Time is running, Butt and Legs is coming. Do not miss the workout today.
It’s time for some workout with Butt and Legs app. Let’s stay fit.
Warning from Butt and Legs! Don’t forget the workout of the day.
Get closer today to your perfect body with Butt and Legs. It’s just the time.
